title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 475 - Denial, Suspension Or Revocation Of Permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 475 - Denial, Suspension Or Revocation Of Permits

State Regulations
§ 475.1 - Grounds
§ 475.2 - Effect of suspension or revocation of permits
§ 475.3 - Procedure for denial, suspension or revocation of permits
§ 475.4 - Judicial review
§ 475.5 - Reissuance of permits, plates and stickers after suspension or revocation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 475

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 509

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
